title: Share of projected base oil demand worldwide by type 2015 to 2030
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 6 lines namely Paraffinic Group I, Paraffinic Group II, Paraffinic Group III, Naphthenic, Synthetic, and Other. The y axis represents Share of projected demand and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Paraffinic Group II, Paraffinic Group III, and Synthetic are gradually increasing, Paraffinic Group I, and Naphthenic are gradually decreasing, Other is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Paraffinic Group I mostly maintained the highest Share of projected demand when compared to others with a mean value of 45.67, and it peaked at 2015.
Followed by Paraffinic Group II which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 26.0 Share of projected demand,reaching its highest point  at 2030 with a value of 31.0.
The botommost line, Other,  has a mean of 1.0, and peaked at 2020.
